org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi

Class BugtrackingSupport<R,Q,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.BugtrackingSupport<R,Q,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the implementation specific repository type
    Q - the implementation specific query type
    I - the implementation specific issue type

    public final class BugtrackingSupport<R,Q,I>
extends Object
    Collection of utility methods for bugtracking systems implementors.
    Since:
    1.85

    • Constructor Summary

      BugtrackingSupport(RepositoryProvider<R,Q,I> repositoryProvider, QueryProvider<Q,I> queryProvider, IssueProvider<I> issueProvider)
      Creates a new BugtrackingSupport preconfigured with mandatory provider implementations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BugtrackingSupport

        public BugtrackingSupport(RepositoryProvider<R,Q,I> repositoryProvider,
                          QueryProvider<Q,I> queryProvider,
                          IssueProvider<I> issueProvider)
        Creates a new BugtrackingSupport preconfigured with mandatory provider implementations.
        Parameters:
        repositoryProvider - a RepositoryProvider to access the implementation specific repository.
        Is mandatory and cannot be null.
        queryProvider - a QueryProvider to access queries from the given repository.
        Is mandatory and cannot be null.
        issueProvider - an IssueProvider to access issues from the given repository.
        Is mandatory and cannot be null.
        Since:
        1.85

    • Method Detail

      • createRepository

        public Repository createRepository(R r,
                                   IssueStatusProvider<R,I> issueStatusProvider,
                                   IssueScheduleProvider<I> issueSchedulingProvider,
                                   IssuePriorityProvider<I> issuePriorityProvider,
                                   IssueFinder issueFinder)
        Factory method to create a Repository instance configured with optional providers.
        Parameters:
        r - a implementation specific repository instance
        issueStatusProvider - an IssueStatusProvider to provide status information of an implementation specific issue.
        Might be null.
        issueSchedulingProvider - an IssueScheduleProvider to provide scheduling information of an implementation specific issue.
        Might be null.
        issuePriorityProvider - an IssuePriorityProvider to provide priority information of an implementation specific issue.
        Might be null.
        issueFinder - an IssueFinder to find issue references in text..
        Might be null.
        Returns:
        a Repository instance
        Since:
        1.85

      • editQuery

        public void editQuery(R r,
                      Q q)
        Opens in the editor area a TopComponent with the given Queries UI in edit mode.
        Parameters:
        r - a implementation specific Repository instance
        q - a implementation specific Query instance
        Since:
        1.85
        See Also:
        QueryController

      • openIssue

        public void openIssue(R r,
                      I i)
        Opens in the editor area a TopComponent with the given Issues UI in edit mode.
        Parameters:
        r - a implementation specific Repository instance
        i - a implementation specific Issue instance
        Since:
        1.85

      • addToCategory

        public void addToCategory(R r,
                          I i)
        Opens a UI to select an Tasks Dashboard Category to add the given Issue into.
        Parameters:
        r - a implementation specific Repository instance
        i - a implementation specific Issue instance
        Since:
        1.85

      • setQueryAutoRefresh

        public void setQueryAutoRefresh(R r,
                                Q q,
                                boolean autoRefresh)
        Determines default auto-refresh for a given query.
        Parameters:
        r - a implementation specific Repository instance
        q - a implementation specific Query instance
        autoRefresh - determines the auto-refresh setting for a given query
        Since:
        1.107

      • editRepository

        public boolean editRepository(R r,
                              String errorMessage)
        Opens a UI to edit a repository.
        Parameters:
        r - a implementation specific Repository instance
        errorMessage - an message to be show in the repository edit dialog
        Returns:
        true in case the repository was changed, otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.85

      • getPriorityIcons

        public Image[] getPriorityIcons()
        Priority icons used by default in the Tasks Dashboard sorted from the highest priority.
        Use them in case you want your bugtracking plugin implementation to use the same icons as are used by default in the Tasks Dashboard, or provide a IssuePriorityProvider implementation via createRepository(java.lang.Object, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueStatusProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueScheduleProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssuePriorityProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueFinder)
        Returns:
        priority icons
        Since:
        1.85
